explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: Published materials detail the selection and evaluation process for the company's AI solution and reference an "agentic AI roadmap" that mentions ongoing operational management and strategic oversight for AI. The company also announced the appointment of an individual with expertise in artificial intelligence and emerging technologies to its Board of Directors, indicating a strategic effort to integrate AI-specific knowledge into its leadership.
governance.path_to_improvement: Name an AI governance body with defined mandate covering all AI use.

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports governance by detailing the selection and evaluation process for the RELEX AI solution, and implies a focus on ROI and efficiency. Transparency is supported by the mention of AI/ML capabilities and automation, indicating the use of machine learning algorithms for forecasting and replenishment.
relevant_sources.title: GPC Asia Pacific AI Supply Chain Platform Adoption

relevant_sources.summary: This press release from RELEX Solutions provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports transparency by explicitly mentioning the AI/ML and automation capabilities of their forecasting and replenishment platform, indicating clarity about the system's nature and function. Furthermore, the mention of an "agentic AI roadmap" suggests ongoing operational management and strategic oversight, which are key aspects of AI governance.
relevant_sources.title: RELEX Solutions GPC Implementation Announcement

relevant_sources.summary: This press release supports the **governance** pillar by announcing the appointment of an individual with expertise in artificial intelligence and emerging technologies to the Board of Directors. This indicates a strategic effort to integrate AI-specific knowledge into the company's leadership, which is relevant to establishing oversight and direction for AI initiatives.
relevant_sources.title: GPC Advances Board Refreshment Program With New Appointments (2025)

oversight.path_to_improvement: Document human review processes for AI-assisted decisions (built or vendor AI).

privacy.path_to_improvement: Document data protection practices for AI systems, including vendor AI data handling.

transparency.findings: Published materials mention the AI/ML capabilities and automation used in the company's forecasting and replenishment platform. These materials indicate the use of machine learning algorithms and provide clarity about the system's nature and function.
transparency.path_to_improvement: Publish detailed documentation (model cards, system specs) for AI systems deployed.

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports governance by detailing the selection and evaluation process for the RELEX AI solution, and implies a focus on ROI and efficiency. Transparency is supported by the mention of AI/ML capabilities and automation, indicating the use of machine learning algorithms for forecasting and replenishment.
relevant_sources.title: GPC Asia Pacific AI Supply Chain Platform Adoption

relevant_sources.summary: This press release from RELEX Solutions provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports transparency by explicitly mentioning the AI/ML and automation capabilities of their forecasting and replenishment platform, indicating clarity about the system's nature and function. Furthermore, the mention of an "agentic AI roadmap" suggests ongoing operational management and strategic oversight, which are key aspects of AI governance.
relevant_sources.title: RELEX Solutions GPC Implementation Announcement

summary.overall_findings: Genuine Parts' published materials mention AI/ML capabilities and automation for forecasting and replenishment, reflecting practices in transparency and contributing to the documentation of 2 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars. Governance disclosures detail the selection and evaluation process for the RELEX AI solution and reference an "agentic AI roadmap." Drawing from 4 publicly available sources, no qualifying public evidence was found for the majority of the 7 evaluated pillars.
